newsitem.title: USA: Elcom mulls merger, sale or partnerhip.
newsitem.headline: Elcom mulls merger, sale or partnerhip.

text.p: Elcom International Inc said Wednesday it hired Smith Barney Inc to help the company increase stockholder value, which would include selling or merging the company.
"These actions will include the evaluation of a possible sale or merger of the company, the evaluation of potential strategic partners, and strategic financing options," a company statement said.
The company's stock rose 1/8 to 6-1/8 Wednesday morning, still a long way from its 52-week high of 10-5/8.
Elcom said its Catalink Direct subsidiary, which has 17 sales and support offices in the U.S. and seven in Great Britain, "could provide a partner with a strong PC products platform."
